transcript_chunks.text: another great conversation that happened andy and i see this five-hour energy drink and and the girl behind like the booth girl behind it was like do you guys want a five-hour energy drink and then you're like yeah let's do that she goes well you got to fill out this form first and i'm like i don't want to this question a questionnaire but it was one page like oh put your email in your and your and your uh name so of course what did you do what i do i've typed in kevin flashback to three days ago when we're in kansas city and kevin goes how do they keep getting my number i legitimately said that [ __ ] you guys are you serious listen i don't like my information being out there all right kevin you're our buffer do you understand that's so funny buffer
